1. if else
Question: Jika ada dua bilangan bulat, kembalikan nilai perkalian keduanya jika hasilnya sama dengan atau lebih rendah dari 1000. Selain itu, kembalikan hasil penjumlahan mereka

entry.title: Migrating From Windows To Proxmox
entry.summary: 2023-12-22 Tried installing a new GPU, GTX 1050 Ti to the server. And I needed to change the order of the NIC in the PCIE slot (because it won‚Äôt fit two GPUS in the configuration before). But turns out, proxmox wouldn‚Äôt boot. entry.title: Adventure of a Lifetime
entry.summary:
I would like to start with the first post on my blog to be about my wife.
This year has been an adventure of a lifetime. So last year in December, I got married to a woman named Ozy Sheila Rafsani. It has been so fun. We go to so many places, eat so many food, experience so many feelings, and learn so many things.
Thank you for staying by my side. For trying so hard to be my friend. For che...
